basic.description: A limited number of students will be able to do clinical family law placements under the supervision of a faculty member. These placements may include some of the following: Family Court Clinic, Children's Aid Society, clerking with a unified Family Court Justice, and working with a family law practitioner. (To be offered jointly with LAW-521.) Three term-hours; Fall and Winter. N. Bala.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Clinical Family Law
